sentences.en: A cannula has to be inserted into a leg vein.
sentences.cn: 必须应用小腿的静脉放置导管.

sentences.en: He could have died after developing deep vein thrombosis during a flight to Sydney.
sentences.cn: 他在一次飞往悉尼的航行中得了深静脉血栓，险些丧命。

sentences.en: It is one of his finest works in a lighter vein.
sentences.cn: 这是他行文风格轻松活泼的作品中最出色的作品之一。

sentences.en: Its predominant vein was, in Poe's own phrase, " the grotesque and arabesque. "
sentences.cn: 它的最主要的特点, 用坡自己的话说, 就是 “ 怪诞和奇异. ”

sentences.en: Le Duc Tho cabled me in a similar vein on October 27.
sentences.cn: 十月二十七日,黎德寿以同样基调给我来电.

sentences.en: Passengers on long-haul flights are being warned about the risks of deep vein thrombosis.
sentences.cn: 长途航班上的乘客须注意可能出现深静脉血栓。

sentences.en: She felt the blood racing through her veins as they kissed.
sentences.cn: 他们接吻时她觉得热血沸腾。

sentences.en: The azygos vein ascends in the right paravertebral gutter.
sentences.cn: 奇静脉在右侧脊柱旁沟内上升.

sentences.en: The doctor injects glucose into the patient's vein.
sentences.cn: 医生把葡萄糖注射入病人的静脉.

sentences.en: The girl now replies in similar vein.
sentences.cn: 这个女孩现在以相似的口吻回答。

sentences.en: The striker's rich vein of form this season has seen him net 32 goals.
sentences.cn: 这位前锋本赛季状态奇佳，进球已达到32个。

sentences.en: The thought of Carrie turned his mind into a most pleasant vein.
sentences.cn: 一想到嘉莉,他的头脑就变得飘飘然了.

sentences.en: This Spanish drama has a vein of black humour running through it.
sentences.cn: 这出西班牙戏剧自始至终都带有几分黑色幽默。

sentences.en: We can see that the massive vein is revealed by resistivity.
sentences.cn: 可以看出,致密的矿脉可用电阻率法来发现.

sentences.en: Without knowing it, she rose to a tragic vein.
sentences.cn: 她不自觉地提高了嗓门儿,音调很伤感.

trans.tran_cn: 静脉，[地]矿脉，岩脉，[植]叶脉，气质，倾向
trans.tran_en: one of the tubes which carries blood to your heart from other parts of your body

trans.tran_cn: 使成脉络；象脉络般分布于
